author: parithosh
content:
Apologies for the late announcement, but we have MSF-3 shapella scheduled for today. The fork will happen at 12UTC. Tooling can be found here: https://withdrawal-mainnet-shadowfork-3.ethpandaops.io/

We have the following on the testnet:
- Latest recommended release of clients
- lined up bls changes
- will exit a few with no bls changes applied 
- will deposit a few validators
- we have mev_boost configured at a reasonable level
- 2 builders on the network

There's fewer nodes than other shadowfork as we had some issues syncing a few nodes. But there are ~60k validators spread quite evenly on the available nodes.

Do let me know if i should make some last minute changes ðŸ˜„

author: potuz
content: I see we're finalizing well and with full withdrawals, some blocks missing, wondering if it's late reorgs

author: parithosh
content: We're finalizing, no client incompatibilities or anything. We're just traging the signature thing, probably related to the missing blocks. But otherwise an uneventful shadow fork ðŸ˜„
